entry.title: The Data 8 Course Template
entry.content:
Welcome to the Data 8 course template! This is a template site that can be used to deploy Data 8 for your institution. Click the links above to access pages for different parts of the course, which you can customize as you like.

If you’d like intructions on how to fork and modify this template for your Data 8 course, see the Zero to Data 8 guide.
entry.summary: Welcome to the Data 8 course template! This is a template site that can be used to deploy Data 8 for your institution. Click the links above to access pages for different parts of the course, which you can customize as you like. entry.title: Third announcement!
entry.content: The third announcement of the class! So exciting!
entry.summary: The third announcement of the class! So exciting!

entry.title: Second announcement!
entry.content: HW 12 is due Thursday, 4/26 at 11:59pm. You will receive an early submission bonus point if you turn in your final submission by Wednesday, 4/25 at 11:59pm.
entry.summary: HW 12 is due Thursday, 4/26 at 11:59pm. You will receive an early submission bonus point if you turn in your final submission by Wednesday, 4/25 at 11:59pm.

entry.title: First announcement!
entry.content:
• HW 11 is due Thursday, 4/19 at 11:59pm. You will receive an early submission bonus point if you turn in your final submission by Wednesday, 4/18 at 11:59pm.

  • The Project 3 checkpoint is due on Friday, 4/20. The project is due on Friday 4/27.
